title: A Different kind of winning
creator_credit: Rad Pictures, Learning Corporation of America, David Streit and Stephen Gyllenhaal
brief_description: Although she loves skateboarding, Jody is uneasy when her father insists that she participate in a skateboard competition, expecially as she would be competing against her best friend. Based on the book “Skateboard scramble” by Barbara Douglas.
creator_credit_for_label: Rad Pictures, Learning Corporation of America, David Streit and Stephen Gyllenhaal
